name: Save The Coral
description: "Save The Coral" is a special game about the corals of The Great Barrier Reef (the largest coral reef in the world).  Today,  more than 90% coral is going to desapeared, beacause of climate change, pollution,  overfishing, etc.  If all coral desapeared, the most fishes will be die, so let's help to stop the destruction and save the coral , save the ocean.
